nars.util

Class SentencePipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.util.SentencePipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Input, Output

    public class SentencePipe
extends java.lang.Object
implements Input, Output
    Pipes sentences emitted from a NAR to another NAR. Use two in opposite directions for bidirectional communication.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface nars.io.Output
